info.name: Nexon Forums - Dark Blue Scheme
info.description:
A universal scheme for all Nexon games. It makes the forums functional (read: wide) and aesthetically pleasing.

Also check out http://userstyles.org/styles/67951/remove-nexon-forums-facebook-like-button to hide the Facebook Like button.
info.additionalInfo:
Update on July 2nd, 2012 at 11:32 PM EDT. Nexon finally decided to enable the Online Users in specific forums, instead of the at the forums homepage. So I made the changes to fix that. I also noticed a bug on profile pages, apparently Nexon created CSS for inactive tabs. I fixed that up.

Update on July 17th, 2012 at 2:25 PM EDT. Noticed some search fields were revalued, have updated.
Update on July 18th, 2012 at 4:10 PM EDT. Changed the announcement links so that they are white and more legible.
Update on July 24th, 2012 at 2:23 AM EDT. Removed the dashed outline around new posts, lightened the Search box a bit, and fixed some box-shadows that I missed. Thanks to xs0uljaxx for the report.
Update on July 25th, 2012 at 5:19 AM EDT. May have fixed the chrome gray bar issue. I have no idea what I did. I attempted some sort of fix, saw that it didn't work out right, undid it, and everything was magically perfect.
Update on August 2nd, 2012 at 7:40 PM EDT. Made black font into gray, so that people who don't use the automatic coloring style and instead selects black stop making unreadable text for this style.

Update on August 14th, 2012 at 1:13 PM EDT. Minor changes to tables that were still unaffected. Been having trouble with Stylish losing the changes or Nexon updating the IDs of the tables, because I've changed this same stuff a few times already.
